cards.text: Internship opportunities for students within IIIT Tiruchirappalli under the supervision of faculty or internal departments.

Students of IIIT Tiruchirappalli can intern at external organizations such as Companies, Indian Universities and any academic/Research institutes (IISc /IIT/ NIT/ IIIT, etc.)/ Research organizations, helping them gain industrial or research exposure.

cards.header: 3) Regular Internship for the External Students
cards.text: Open to students from other institutes, allowing them to intern at IIITT during the summer or winter break in offline/online mode.

sections.heading: Summer/ Winter Internship Programs
list: Summer (6-8 weeks): Internship program in offline/online mode (usually during the vacation period)
Winter (4-6 weeks): Internship program in offline/online mode (usually during the vacation period)

guidelines.title: Registration Fee (Offline/Online Mode)
guidelines.desc: No registration fee for students from Indian and foreign universities/institutes.

guidelines.title: Submission Form (Offline/Online Mode)
guidelines.desc: Submit the application form with the respective faculty’s consent.

guidelines.title: Fellowship (Offline/Online Mode)
guidelines.desc: Fellowship will be at the discretion of the faculty supervisor subject to availability.

guidelines.title: Accommodation (Offline mode)
guidelines.desc: On-campus accommodation and mess food shall be charged as per the institute norms and the same has to be deposited. Bedding will be provided on a payment basis, if informed in advance. Accommodation charges will be refunded if the student cannot join.

guidelines.title: Certificate (Offline/Online)
guidelines.desc: A certificate will be issued at the end of the internship by the concerned Internship Cell (I-Cell) office with the approval of faculty supervisor.

guidelines.title: Contacts
guidelines.desc: Contact your faculty supervisor in case you have any queries/doubts.

table.event: Submission of Application with Faculty Consent Form on or before 30th May 2025
